item.title: Fans Celebrate Sonika’s 10th Anniversary with Sonikafest!
item.dc:creator: khanadee
item.description:
Another VOCALOID has hit the double digits! VOCALOID 2 Sonika by Zero-G Ltd is now 10 years old! To celebrate, VNN member celestrai organized Sonikafest! Since late May, over 60 people have shown their love for Sonika by participating in events including tuning events, a zine, creating original songs and much, much more. Both an official …

The post Fans Celebrate Sonika’s 10th Anniversary with Sonikafest! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Another VOCALOID has hit the double digits! VOCALOID 2 Sonika by Zero-G Ltd is now 10 years old! To celebrate, VNN member celestrai organized Sonikafest! Since late May, over 60 people have shown their love for Sonika by participating in events including tuning events, a zine, creating original songs and much, much more.

Both an official charm and – after a contest, a fan produced charm – were available for pre-order! This contest received 16 entries, of which nico (Pumpkin Head / galacticism) won.

The SONIKAFEST OFFICIAL CHARM has been revealed! Please stay tuned for information on how to order it and the Contest Winner charm in the limited preorder run! pic.twitter.com/81G8jQpa6F

— SONIK☆FEST @ Tuning Event??? (@sonika_fest) May 26, 2019

The SONIKAFEST Charm Contest has been concluded! Out of 16 gorgeous entries, the winning entry is @galacticism_'s entry! Please stay tuned for information on how to order this charm and the upcoming SONIKAFEST Official charm in the limited preorder run! pic.twitter.com/ZjBOCNuuzw

— SONIK☆FEST @ Tuning Event??? (@sonika_fest) May 26, 2019

A compilation album is free to download on Bandcamp with a donation option to support the organizer in future FESTs celebrating VOCALOID anniversaries.

Tracklist (ft. Sonika)

  • Lo-Fi Wannabe by Joshua Lie (Tuning: MeerkatQueen)
  • Stuck on Repeat by Pika-P
  • Lockjaw by Satinather (Tuning: dotkrawl)
  • Nightfall Parade by Nessa (Tuning: Pumpkin Head)
  • The Divinely Authorized Order of the Universe by Pumpkin Head
  • Living Hell by DEVILCAT
  • Kilter by OneThoughtRemains (Tuning: Pumpkin Head)
  • Still Standing by Kyttynz
  • Silence by MeerkatQueen
  • Landing by Quasar-P (Tuning: Pika-P)
  • Forget This, Forget You by MC Ballad
  • Wind In My Hair by Slightly Shredded
  • Stardust Message by celestrai

A zine is also available for free download with a donation option. 

Zine Contributors

  • Universally Skullie
  • CrisisNoi
  • hq
  • Taro
  • aureityGonoph
  • Synchro_Style
  • Crossy
  • tyler ray
  • MeerkatQueen
  • Purpled
  • Mixer-Endo
  • Teppichhai
  • Lone
  • Aia
  • Asami
  • DEVILCAT
  • celestrai

Please consider donating to both the album and zine!

The fun doesn’t stop today, either. Tomorrow (7/15/19), be on the lookout for the arranged version of the Zero-G Sonika Song Contest’s winning song U Know It by VioletCall, featuring seven people’s – myself included – different tuning styles!

Sources

Sonika was created by Zero-G Ltd.! They also have a Twitter and Facebook!
Sonikafest is on Twitter! Sonikafest is run by the marvelous celestrai!

The post Fans Celebrate Sonika’s 10th Anniversary with Sonikafest! appeared first on VNN.
